ftbchunks.hard_team_force_limit.tooltip:
Hard force-load limit for party teams, regardless of member count or Party Limit Calculation mode.
Default of 0 means no hard limit.
ftbchunks.no_wilderness_dimensions.toolt:
List of dimension ID's where chunks must be claimed before modifying.
E.g. add "minecraft:the_nether" to require chunks to be claimed in the Nether.
Wildcards are allowed, e.g. "othermod:*" matches all dimensions added by "othermod"
ftbchunks.pvp_mode: Allow PvP Combat in Claimed Chunks
ftbchunks.max_claimed_chunks.tooltip: This default can be overridden by the FTB Ranks 'ftbchunks.max_claimed` permission node.
ftbchunks.minimap.proportional.tooltip:
When true, minimap size is proportional to 10%% of the screen width (modifiable by the Scale setting)
When false, it is a fixed size regardless of screen resolution
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.allow_fake_play: Allows fake players which have the ID of a real player access to your claims, IF that real player would be permitted, either as ally or team member. Set this to true if you're unsure.
ftbchunks.minimap.font_scale.tooltip: Recommended to keep this to a multiple of 0.5
ftbchunks.force_load_mode.tooltip:
NEVER: only allow chunk force-loading if the owning team has at least one online player
ALWAYS: always allow force-loading, even if no players are online
DEFAULT: allow force-loading IF the team has at least one player with the FTB Ranks 'ftbchunks.chunk_load_offline' permission
ftbchunks.waypoints.waypoint_focus_dista: How close does the player crosshair need to be to a waypoint to display its name?
ftbchunks.fake_players.tooltip:
CHECK: check fake player access like any real player
DENY: never allow fake players
ALLOW: always allow fake players
ftbchunks.need_to_claim_chunk: You need to claim this chunk to interact with blocks here!
ftbchunks.advanced.memory.max_zoom_const:
When true, max map zoom-out is limited by the number of explored regions and amount of available memory.
If this is bothersome, set this to false.
ftbchunks.minimap.show_player_when_unloc: Show player when not locked north
ftbchunks.waypoints.death_waypoint_autor: If > 0, the closest deathpoint will be auto-removed if it is closer than this distance from you
ftbchunks.max_prevented_log_age: Fake Player Prevented Access Log Age
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.allow_named_fak:
Treat these fake players as allies of the team.
WARNING: Adding entries here could allow hostile players to access your claims via those fake players. Leave this empty if you're unsure.
ftbchunks.ally_mode: Allow Player to Change Ally Settings
ftbchunks.location_mode_override.tooltip: If true, team "Location Visibility" settings are ignored, and all players can see each other anywhere on the map
ftbchunks.hard_team_claim_limit.tooltip:
Hard claim limit for party teams, regardless of member count or Party Limit Calculation mode.
Default of 0 means no hard limit.
ftbchunks.advanced.memory.region_release:
Timeout in seconds to release data for 512x512 regions which haven't been accessed recently
Smaller values mean less memory usage, but more disk access as released regions are reloaded
Set to 0 to disable releasing of region data.
ftbchunks.zoom_warning: Max zoom-out limited due to memory constraints
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.block_interact_: Used when blocks are right-clicked, e.g. opening a chest or flipping a lever
ftbchunks.claim_dimension_whitelist.tool:
Whitelist for dimension ID's where chunks may be claimed. If non-empty, dimension *must* be in this list (and also not in "Dimension Blacklist".
Same syntax as for "Dimension Blacklist"
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.block_edit_and_: Used when blocks are being placed, broken, or interacted with
ftbchunks.party_limit_mode.tooltip:
Method by which party claim & force-load limits are calculated.
LARGEST: use the limits of the member with the largest limits
SUM: add up all the members' limits
OWNER: use the party owner's limits only
AVERAGE: use the average of all members' limits.
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.allow_pvp.toolt:
Should player-vs-player combat be allowed in claimed areas?
Server config setting 'Allow PvP Combat' must be 'per_team' for this to function
Not guaranteed to protect against 100%% of indirect attacks; requires that damage sources can be attributed to a player
ftbchunks.claim_dimension_blacklist.tool:
Blacklist for dimension ID's where chunks may not be claimed.
E.g. add "minecraft:the_end" to this list if you want to disable chunk claiming in The End
Wildcards are allowed, e.g. "othermod:*" matches all dimensions added by "othermod"
ftbchunks.require_game_stage.tooltip: If true, players must have the 'ftbchunks_mapping' game stage (KubeJS and/or Gamestages required) to be able to open the map or see the minimap
ftbchunks.appearance.own_claimed_chunks_: Show your own claimed chunks on map
ftbchunks.max_prevented_log_age.tooltip:
Age in days to keep logs of prevented fake player access
Note: not fully implemented feature; will be used in future to display & control access by fake players to your claims
ftbchunks.disable_protection.tooltip: Useful for private servers where everyone is trusted, and claims are only used for force-loading
ftbchunks.max_idle_days_before_unforce.t:
If no team member logs in for this many days, any force-loaded chunks will no longer be force-loaded.
Setting this to 0 disables auto-unforceloading.
ftbchunks.ally_mode.tooltip:
DEFAULT: FTB Teams ally status is checked to decide if players are allied
FORCED_ALL: all players are always considered to be allied
FORCED_NONE: no players are ever considered to be allied
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.location_mode.t: Controls who can see you on the map or minimap (outside the normal vanilla tracking range)
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.allow_fake_play: Allow Fake Players by Player ID
ftbchunks.waypoints.waypoint_focus_scale: How big do focused waypoints grow?
ftbchunks.protect_unknown_explosions.too:
Some explosion sources (e.g. Ghasts) can't be determined in code.
If this setting is true, damage from these explosion is prevented in protected chunks.
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.allow_fake_play:
Treat ALL fake players as allies of the team.
WARNING: Setting this to true could allow hostile players to access your claims via any fake player. Set this to false if you're unsure.
ftbchunks.advanced.memory.autorelease_on:
When the large map is closed, auto-release region data down to this number.
Smaller values mean less memory usage, but more disk access as released regions are reloaded
Set to 0 to disable releasing of region data.
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.nonliving_entit: Used when non-living entities (paintings, item frames etc.) are left-clicked
ftbchunks.max_force_loaded_chunks.toolti: This default can be overridden by the FTB Ranks 'ftbchunks.max_force_loaded` permission node.
ftbchunks.long_range_tracker_interval.to:
Interval in ticks to send updates to clients with long-range player tracking data.
Lower values mean more frequent updates but more server load and network traffic; be careful with this, especially on busy servers.
Setting this to 0 disables long-range tracking.
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.allow_mob_grief:
Should mobs be allowed to damage blocks in claimed areas?
Note: currently Endermen only; may include other mobs in future
Creeper explosions are protected against via "Allow Explosions"
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.block_edit_mode: Used when blocks are being placed or broken
ftbchunks.pvp_mode.tooltip:
ALWAYS: allow PvP combat in all claimed chunks
NEVER: prevent PvP in all claimed chunks
PER_TEAM: teams can decide if PvP is allowed in their claims via team property
ftbchunks.no_wilderness.tooltip: If true, chunks must be claimed before they can be built on
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.allow_explosion: Should explosions be able to damage blocks in claimed areas?
ftbchunks.max_idle_days_before_unclaim.t:
If no team member logs in for this many days, the team's claims will be released.
Setting this to 0 disables auto-unclaiming.
ftbteamsconfig.ftbchunks.claim_visibilit: Controls who can see your claims on the map or minimap
